glossary.ai_extracted_from_cms1500: Source document and extraction confidence shown.
glossary.overcoded: The billed CPT may not match documentation detail; consider downcoding.
glossary.missing_modifier: Claim may require a modifier (e.g., 25, 59) to bypass NCCI edits.
